'''2020 Winter Art Contest''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 1.1]].

==Description==
Art contest is back, and the theme is: Winter!

Paimon is eager to see your awesome fanart, so:
# Post it on Twitter with #GenshinImpact & #GenshinWinter before Dec. 27, 23:59 (UTC+8)
# Fill this form: https://forms.gle/5oohvXEqpPYELjc8A ...

Rewards: Blessing of the Welkin Moon for 50 artists<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1340007170998300672 Official Announcement]</ref>

==Rewards==
* [[Blessing of the Welkin Moon]] (50 Winners)
* Top 3 Winners will additionally have their works retweeted
